data.description_html:
The transmuted creature becomes smarter.
The spell grants an enhancement bonus to Intelligence of 1d4+1 points, adding the usual benefits to Intelligence-related skills.
Wizards who receive fox's cunning do not gain extra spells, but the save DCs for their spells increase.
Arcane Material Component: A few hairs, or a pinch of dung, from a fox.
data.name: Fox's Cunning
